summary:
first you need the steel smithing perk then go to a forge and you will have your ultimate weapon in no time

Extract \"UltimateWeapon.esp\" from the rar file to 
\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\"

Any issues just leave a comment ;)
descriptionHtml:

Any issues just leave a comment ;)
